text:
Company: Rodriguez-Hale
Role: Data Management Lead (R&D)

About Us:
Rodriguez-Hale is a leading research and development firm dedicated to pushing the boundaries of innovation. Our diverse team of experts collaborates to drive progress and make a meaningful impact.

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Data Management Lead to join our R&D department. As a Data Management Lead, you will be responsible for overseeing the collection, analysis, and reporting of data to inform business decisions. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to develop and implement data management strategies, ensuring data quality and integrity.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain large datasets to drive business insights
- Collaborate with stakeholders to identify data requirements and develop data management plans
- Design and implement data visualization tools to communicate findings
- Ensure data quality and integrity by developing and implementing data validation processes
- Lead a team of data analysts to achieve project goals

Qualifications:
- Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field
- 5+ years of experience in data management, with a focus on R&D
- Proven track record of developing and implementing data management strategies
- Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
- Strong leadership and communication skills

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for career growth and professional development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
- Flexible work arrangements, including remote work options

We are committed to fair and impartial recruitment practices, and welcome applications from diverse candidates.
